description: Product of prime and previous prime is palindromic.
links: P. De Geest, More palindromic products of integer sequences
mathematica: p=2; t={}; Do[q=NextPrime[p]; If[Reverse[x=IntegerDigits[p*q]]==x,AppendTo[t,q]]; p=q,{n,150000}]; t (* _Jayanta Basu_, Jun 05 2013 *)
author: _Patrick De Geest_
